notes.text: This is the 60 day notification for the retirement of Red Hat Directory Server 9.
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
In accordance with the Red Hat Directory Server Life Cycle policy, Red Hat Directory Server 9 will be retired as of June 10, 2017 and support will no longer be provided. Accordingly, Red Hat will not provide extended support for this product, including critical impact security patches or
urgent priority bug fixes, after this date. In addition, after June 10 2017, technical support through Red Hat's Global Support Services will no longer be provided.

We encourage customers to plan their migration from Red Hat Directory Server 9 to the latest version of Red Hat Directory Server  (Red Hat Directory Server 10). Please contact your Red Hat account representative if you have questions and/or concerns on this matter. 

Full details of the Red Hat Directory Server Life Cycle can be found at:
https://access.redhat.com/support/policy/updates/directory/
notes.title: Details

document.title: Red Hat Security Advisory: Red Hat Directory Server 9 - 60 Day Retirement Notice
